title: S7E16 – "Fair Weather Fiends" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author B.T. Joy, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about vicious viruses, timeless trauma, horrendous habits, and houses of horror.
